title: Test Your Metal
description: [Siren Classic Erotic Alternative Romance, M/M, spanking, HEA] Ever dreamed of meeting a rock star?Ryan Elliott did too, one day, it became a reality. Attending a long awaited UK concert, Ryan, sweet and intelligent, has a "near kiss experience" with the hunky frontman of his favourite band when he jumps into the crowd. A chance meeting in a bar after the gig leaves Ryan with a hang-over and a mobile number. Bradley May is the sexy lead singer of metal band Time of Death. Wanted by men and women, he can have anyone; the only problem is he's yet to come out to his friends and family, let alone the arbitrary public. Meeting again, the two hook up for a steamy night of passion leading to a whirlwind romance. Soon the American band is required to return home and Brad asks his new boyfriend to go with him. Can Ryan really agree to move to New Jersey and begin a new life with his beau? This book is written in one point of view. This book is written in first-person point of view. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Suzi Slade
